name: moss-sim
description:
Yr a little moss ball spreading yr spores around the world :3

Eventually the spores grow into friends :>

Oh, how i wish i could be an amorphous assemblage of sentient greenery :)

This game is textless and has no exits/endings/etc. Select "auto" at the beginning to let it run without input.

---------------------------------

Made using bitsy and bitsy-boilerplate, along with several bitsy-hacks: transparent-sprites, edit-image-from-dialog, and bitsymuse, as well as custom hacks for the tile art and "auto" mode. (source code)
